oshi.json.hardware

Interface ComputerSystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OshiJsonObject, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComputerSystemImpl

    public interface ComputerSystem
extends OshiJsonObject
    The ComputerSystem represents the physical hardware, of a computer system/product and includes BIOS/firmware and a motherboard, logic board, etc.
    Author:
    SchiTho1 [at] Securiton AG, widdis [at] gmail [dot] com

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Baseboard getBaseboard()
      Get the computer system baseboard/motherboard
      Firmware getFirmware()
      Get the computer system firmware/BIOS
      String getManufacturer()
      Get the computer system manufacturer.
      String getModel()
      Get the computer system model.
      String getSerialNumber()
      Get the computer system serial number

      • Methods inherited from interface oshi.json.json.OshiJsonObject

        toCompactJSON, toCompactJSON, toJSON, toJSON, toPrettyJSON, toPrettyJSON
